data.comment: In the minute -1, It is reported that 4535 spectators are in attendance today.
The first-half is in progress. Sochi get the game underway.
In Moscow Dinamo Moscow drive forward through Sergey Parshivlyuk. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow close to the penalty box.
Free kick Sochi.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 9, Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
In Moscow, Dmitri Skopintsev of Dinamo Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 11, Goal! Daniil Lesovoy gives Dinamo Moscow a 1-0 lead.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sochi in Moscow.
In the minute 13, Sochi attack but Sergey Terekhov's header doesn't find the target.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
Dinamo Moscow drive upfield and Nikolay Komlichenko gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sochi defender.
In the minute 14, Sebastian Szymanski of Dinamo Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Dinamo Moscow needs to be cautious. Sochi have an attacking throw-in.
Dinamo Moscow's Clinton N'Jie is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Sochi to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
The home team replace Clinton N'Jie with Vyacheslav Grulev.
In the minute 18, Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Moscow, Anton Zabolotnyi (Sochi) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
In the minute 20, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Sochi.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
In the minute 22, Goal! Miha Mevlja (Sochi) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Moscow.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Sochi.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 26, Sebastian Szymanski puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Ivan Ordets (Dinamo Moscow) has received a yellow card from Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Nikita Burmistrov for Sochi gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 33, Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniil Lesovoy (Dinamo Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Sochi.
At VTB Arena, Ivan Miladinovic has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
In the minute 37, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Sochi throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Sochi's Artur Yusupov has been booked in Moscow.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Sochi have a dangerous throw-in.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Sochi at VTB Arena.
Can Dinamo Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sochi's half?
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 43, Free kick Sochi.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Sochi.
Nikita Burmistrov for Sochi drives towards goal at VTB Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 44, Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ibrahim Tsallagov (Sochi) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
In the minute 45, Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Nikita Burmistrov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sochi.
In the minute 45, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi blows to end the first-half.
Nikolay Komlichenko for Dinamo Moscow has been booked by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi and receives a first yellow card.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi blows to start the second-half. Dinamo Moscow with the kick-off.
Throw-in Sochi.
In the minute 47, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Sochi's half.
Dinamo Moscow are pushing forward but Dmitri Skopintsev's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Sochi at VTB Arena.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Sochi at VTB Arena.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 48, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a throw-in for Dinamo Moscow, close to Sochi's area.
Charles Kabore (Dinamo Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Vyacheslav Grulev (Dinamo Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 50, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ivan Miladinovic for Sochi who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Sochi's Ivan Miladinovic is back in action after a slight knock.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow needs to be cautious. Sochi have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 55, Sochi drives forward and Anton Zabolotnyi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! Dinamo Moscow extend their lead to 3-1 through Daniil Fomin.
In the minute 55, Nikolay Komlichenko instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Marko Dugandzic is replacing Joaozinho for Sochi at VTB Arena.
Dinamo Moscow pushes forward through Sebastian Szymanski, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 58, Kirill Zaika is on a sub for Nikita Burmistrov for Sochi.
In the minute 60, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 61, Vladimir Fedotov is making the team's third substitution at VTB Arena with Danyl Prutsev replacing Artur Yusupov.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sochi are coming forward and Emanuel Mammana gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
In the minute 71, In Moscow Dinamo Moscow's Nikolay Komlichenko is caught offside.
Sochi push forward at VTB Arena and Danyl Prutsev gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dinamo Moscow defence.
In the minute 74, Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Dinamo Moscow surge into the attack at VTB Arena but Vyacheslav Grulev’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
Sergei Slepov is replacing Sergey Parshivlyuk for the home team.
In the minute 75, Sochi have a dangerous throw-in.
In Moscow Dinamo Moscow attack through Nikolay Komlichenko. The finish is off target, however.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Sochi a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Sochi.
Dinamo Moscow drive into the zone and Daniil Fomin is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a throw-in for Dinamo Moscow, close to Sochi's area.
In the minute 79, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In Moscow, Kirill Zaika (Sochi) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 82, Can Sochi capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dinamo Moscow's half?
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow make their third substitution with Konstantin Rausch replacing Daniil Lesovoy.
Sandro Schwarz (Dinamo Moscow) is making a fourth substitution, with Igor Shkolik replacing Sebastian Szymanski.
Charles Kabore of Dinamo Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Sochi have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Sochi.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
Red card in Moscow! Ibrahim Tsallagov has been shown a second yellow card by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Vyacheslav Grulev's header is off-target for Dinamo Moscow.
Sochi have a goal kick.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Anton Zabolotnyi (Sochi) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Dmitri Skopintsev gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dinamo Moscow.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
